lead_paragraph: Ron Artest and Stephen Jackson, the central figures in the brawl at the Palace of Auburn Hills in 2004, were each suspended without pay by the league yesterday for the first seven games of next season because of their recent legal problems.
snippet: Ron Artest and Stephen Jackson, the central figures in the brawl at the Palace of Auburn Hills in 2004, were each suspended without pay by the league yesterday for the first seven games of next season because of their recent legal problems.
